p: Epiprogoitrin, progoitrin, epigoitrin and goitrin were assessed at various concentrations at four dose levels (0.625, 1.25, 2.5 and 5 mg/mL) in different experiments with virus concentration of 50 EID 50. 3 mg/mL of peramivir was used as the positive control and sodium chloride injection was used as the negative control. Equal dose of virus and DMSO were set as virus control and dilute control, respectively. Sham-operated group was performed as well. 8 eggs were inoculated in each group.
